summary: This is a calendar invitation and forwarded email from June 28, 2019, scheduling a case briefing on the Epstein investigation for July 1, 2019, at 3:30 p.m. in the ADIC Large Conference Room. It indicates FBI New York personnel are briefing the Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) on the case.

events.title: Epstein Case Briefing for ADIC
events.description: A scheduled briefing for the Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) on the Epstein case, to be held in the ADIC Large Conference Room on the 28th floor after an 'EM meeting' wraps up.

keyFacts: An FBI case briefing on Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for July 1, 2019, at 3:30 p.m.
The briefing was for the Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) and was to be held in the ADIC Large Conference Room on the 28th floor.
The scheduling email was sent on June 28, 2019, indicating active FBI management oversight of the investigation at that time.
The document references an 'EM meeting' that typically concludes around 3:30/3:40 p.m., preceding the case brief.
